= Get jBCrypt in Maven =

jBCrypt 0.3m ('m' for Maven) is now available in Maven Central.

{{{        
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mindrot</groupId>
  <artifactId>jbcrypt</artifactId>
  <version>0.3m</version>
</dependency>
}}}
